Description:
Sales Representative - Oil and Gas SectorWe’re seeking a qualified Sales Representative for our UAE branch, to help sell our Engineering-related IT Solutions and Services in the Oil and Gas Sector.The Sales Rep should have a strong understanding of the sales process and excel at generating leads, building relationships, and closing deals. The ideal candidate will be a quick learner who has strong negotiating skills and an ability to showcase our offerings in a compelling way. Objectives of this roleRepresent the company’s products and services in the Oil and Gas Sector, using consumer research as well as deep and comprehensive knowledge of how our solutions meet the needs of customers
Achieve weekly, monthly, and annual sales quotas by successfully implementing sales and marketing strategies and tactics
Generate leads and build relationships by organizing daily work schedules to call on existing and potential customers
Develop and implement a territory action plan using comprehensive data analysis, and adjust sales techniques according to interactions and results in the fieldResponsibilitiesMaintain working relationships with existing clients to ensure that they receive exceptional service and to identify potential new sales opportunities
Prepare technical and commercial proposal
Identify prospects, set appointments, make effective qualifying sales calls, and manage sales cycle to close new business in all service categories
Possess in-depth product knowledge and be able to conduct demos and handle objections
Prepare concise and accurate reports, proposals, booking packages, and other required documentation for executive-level presentations
Achieve sales goals by assessing current client needs and following a defined selling process with potential buyers, often including product demos and presentations
Coordinate with other sales representatives to ensure that quotas are being met and company standards are being upheldJob Location is Abudhabi, United Arab EmiratesSkills
Skills:
Three or more years of sales experience in Oil & Gas
Excellent communication, interpersonal, problem-solving, presentation, and organizational skills
Fluency in English, both spoken and written.
Proficiency with sales management software and CRM
Strong ability to balance persuasion with professionalism

Bachelor’s degree or equivalent
Proven success rate at levels above sales quota
Ability to travel at least 25% of the time to customer site and events
